article_title: Chairman And CEO Of Kaiser Permanente

article_metadata.description: After a career spanning more than 30 years in various roles with Kaiser Permanente, Mr. Tyson became CEO in July of 2013 and then added the role of Chairman in January of 2014. Today, Kaiser Permanente serves more than 9.6 million members across eight states and the District of Columbia [...]
article_metadata.author: Dan Munro
